root.cn: 通过寻找农场里的各种可爱的小动物，培养幼儿的观察能力。小动物们有各种可能藏身的地方，等着孩子们去发现哦， 农场里的动物种类齐全，包含100多种动物,涵盖鸟类动物，哺乳动物，海洋动物，昆虫等，统统找出来即可完成任务。 启发孩子的想象力、记忆力、创造力，开发智力；宝贝们，快来农场一起寻找动物吧!
root.en: By looking for all kinds of cute animals in the farm, we can cultivate children's observation ability. There are all kinds of hiding places for small animals, waiting for children to find out, The farm has a wide range of animals, including more than 100 kinds of animals, including birds, mammals, marine animals, insects, etc., all of which can be found out to complete the task. Inspire children's imagination, memory, creativity and intelligence; come to the farm to find animals, babies!
